title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices          Visitor Center  Located in the lobby of the Science Museum of Minnesota. 120 W. Kellogg Blvd. Saint Paul, MN 55102 (map) See our Operating Hours and Seasons page or call (651) 293-0200 for more information on hours.               Headquarters Suite 105 111 Kellogg Blvd E. St. Paul, MN 55101-1256 Telephone: (651) 290-4160 FAX: (651) 290-3214 E-mail us Hours: Monday through Friday 8:00 am - 4:30 pm. The headquarters' offices are closed on federal holidays.     Leadership Superintendent John Anfinson (651) 293-8432 Administration Nick Karasch (651) 293-8418 Education and Public Programs Dan Dressler (651) 293-8412 Formal Education Lyndon Torstenson (651) 293-8426 Natural and Cultural Resources Alan Robbins-Fenger (651) 293-8438 Volunteers in Parks Kathy Swenson (651) 293-8424
